author: Robert Purchese
description:
Exodus looks a lot like Mass Effect - let's get that out of the way. Not only does Archetype's space-faring RPG have the same look and the same sensibilities, right down to getting a spaceship and gathering a crew in order to save the day, but it's made by some of same the people who dreamt Mass Effect up, including, notably, lead Mass Effect 1 & 2 writer Drew Karpyshyn.

Read more
title: "The impact of time dilation is something very unique and fresh" - sci-fi RPG Exodus looks like Mass Effect but there's a very important difference
